==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Arayesh:''' Do you need an in-room haircut service?
:{{DIcon}} And you are...
::'''Arayesh:''' I'm a hair stylist, at your service!
::'''Arayesh:''' Leave your hair to me. I will create the most fashionable and suitable hairstyle for you.
::'''Arayesh:''' Between cutting, perming, and coloring, I'm the best at coloring, especially color mixes.
::'''Arayesh:''' If I were to design a style for you, for example... A little longer here, and a little shorter in the back. That'd frame your face better.
::'''Arayesh:''' Then a gradient color... It would be wonderful!
:{{DIcon}} Maybe next time.
::'''Arayesh:''' A change in hairstyle is a change in mood. Come to me if you need a change!
{{Dialogue End}}
